author: Staff Reporter
text:
M. Arulraj (30) of Sivanthipatti, Tirunelveli surrendered in Kovilpatti Judicial Magistrate Court I on Saturday in connection with a double murder in a farm of Subash Pannaiyar near Pazhayakayal on March 8, sources said. A gang entered the farm and murdered M. Arumugasami (32) of Surandai and A. Kannan (55) of Pazhayakayal – aides of Subash Pannaiyar.

Besides, three others who surrendered in a court in Pudukottai on March 10 in connection with this double murder were produced before Tiruchendur Judicial Magistrate Court amidst tight security. The accused were Kannan alias Kandasamy alias M. Kannabiran (36) of Chathiram Pudhukulam near Tirunelveli, Mani alias M. Manikandan (28) of Melakarai and S. Murugan (24) of Padugaiyur near Srivaikuntam. After hearing, the Judicial Magistrate Irudhayarani adjourned the case until March 23. Meanwhile, Authoor Inspector of Police Vijaya Kumar submitted a petition seeking seven-day police custody of the three accused.
title: Double murder: man surrenders in court
